content.question: Suppose that w is increasing at the constant rate of 7 units per second. When w = 5, what is the rate of change of k with respect to time?

frqParts.text: Suppose that w is increasing at the constant rate of 7 units per second. When w = 5, what is the rate of change of k with respect to time?

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
